mapper.select: select id, file_url, imm_req_json, created_time, is_deleted from tb_oss_upload where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_oss_upload(file_url, imm_req_json, created_time, is_deleted) values (#{fileUrl}, #{immReqJson}, #{createdTime}, #{isDeleted})

insert into tb_oss_upload(file_url, imm_req_json, created_time, is_deleted) values
(#{entity.fileUrl}, #{entity.immReqJson}, #{entity.createdTime}, #{entity.isDeleted})

insert into tb_oss_upload(file_url, imm_req_json, created_time, is_deleted) values
(#{entity.fileUrl}, #{entity.immReqJson}, #{entity.createdTime}, #{entity.isDeleted})
on duplicate key update file_url = values(file_url), imm_req_json = values(imm_req_json), created_time = values(created_time), is_deleted = values(is_deleted)
mapper.update:
update tb_oss_upload
file_url = #{fileUrl},
imm_req_json = #{immReqJson},
created_time = #{createdTime},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted},
where id = #{id}
